    • checkActiveTilesInBoard

      public static void checkActiveTilesInBoard(List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, TileSubject[][] bookShelf, TileSubject[][] board) throws WrongChosenTilesFromBoardException
      Checks the validity of the chosen tiles from the board in the game.
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - list of coordinates of the chosen tiles.
      bookShelf - matrix of tile subjects representing the player's bookshelf.
      board - matrix of tile subjects representing the game board.
      Throws:
      WrongChosenTilesFromBoardException - exception thrown when the chosen tiles aren't valid.
      See Also:
      • Coordinate
      • TileSubject
      • WrongChosenTilesFromBoardException

    • findIndexAllActiveTilesInBoard

      public static List<Coordinate> findIndexAllActiveTilesInBoard(TileSubject[][] board)
      Retrieves a list of coordinates that correspond to the tile subjects selectable in the board
      Parameters:
      board - the board matrix
      Returns:
      coordinates of clickable tiles on board
      See Also:

      public static List<Coordinate> findIndexActiveAfterOneChosenTile(TileSubject[][] board, Coordinate c1, TileSubject[][] bookShelf) throws WrongChosenTilesFromBoardException
      Retrieves a list of coordinates that correspond to the tile subjects selectable in the board given a selected tile
      Parameters:
      board - the board matrix
      c1 - the coordinates of the selected tiles
      bookShelf - the player's bookshelf

    • addSelectableTiles

      private static void addSelectableTiles(List<Coordinate> coordinates, List<Coordinate> active, Coordinate c)
      Adds the coordinate to the list of selectable tiles if it is present in the list of active coordinates .
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the list of selectable coordinates.
      active - the list of active coordinates.
      c - the coordinate to be added

    • findIndexActiveAfterTwoChosenTiles

      Retrieves a list of coordinates that correspond to the TileSubject selectable in the board given two selected tiles
      Parameters:
      board - the board matrix
      c1 - the coordinate of the first selected tile
      c2 - the coordinate of the second selected tile
      bookShelf - the player's bookshelf
      Returns:
      coordinates of clickable tiles on board given a selected tile
      Throws:
